fullText: The musical about Gloria and Emilio Estefan is a crowd-pleaser that offers a sanitized but energetic look at the couple's rise to fame, with infectious Latin rhythms that will have audiences dancing in their seats.
dtliExcerpt: The musical about Gloria and Emilio Estefan is a crowd-pleaser that offers a sanitized but energetic look at the couple's rise to fame, with infectious Latin rhythms that will have audiences dancing in their seats.
bwwExcerpt: The infectious, earnest musical 'On Your Feet!' initially stutters out the gate and ends somewhat awkwardly, but has a fun, percussive middle, even as it skates perilously close to melodrama. It's saved by its genuine heart - and a list of great tunes, ones that nicely make the transition from radio to stage.
